biotools.summary: Performs differential correlation analysis on input matrices, with multiple conditions specified by a design matrix. Contains functions to filter, process, save, visualize, and interpret differential correlations of identifier-pairs across the entire identifier space, or with respect to a particular set of identifiers (e.g., one).

bioschemas.name: DGCA
bioschemas.summary: Performs differential correlation analysis on input matrices, with multiple conditions specified by a design matrix.
